name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Allen David BRUFSKY.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Allen David BRUFSKY.

opinions.text: Allen David Brufsky, of Naples, Florida, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.

casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Allen David BRUFSKY.
No. D-2802.
Supreme Court of the United States
Aug. 29, 2014.
Opinion
